statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions_audit;
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_interactions_audit WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_interactions_audit WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, details FROM user_interactions_audit ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM user_interactions_audit;
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_interactions_audit WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions_audit WHERE action = 'login' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT timestamp, action, details FROM user_interactions_audit WHERE action IN ('click', 'scroll') ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM user_interactions_audit GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM user_interactions_audit ORDER BY action;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_interactions
SELECT action, user_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT action FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp, user_id FROM security_monitoring
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 456 AND action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND action IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_monitoring WHERE event_type = 'alert' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM security_monitoring WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND event_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_id = 100;
SELECT interaction_data->>'action' AS action, timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChangesAudit WHERE change_type = 'update' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT notification_type, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM SecurityMonitoring GROUP BY notification_type;
SELECT * FROM ChangesAudit WHERE change_type = 'update' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, change_type, timestamp FROM ChangesAudit WHERE user_id = 1234 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type IN ('like', 'comment')
SELECT audit_id, change_data, timestamp FROM ChangesAudit WHERE change_data ->> 'field' = 'value'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5
SELECT * FROM user_audit_log WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM change_audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM security_audit_log WHERE timestamp >= 2022-01-01;
SELECT * FROM system_audit_log WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT id, table_name, action, timestamp FROM change_audit_log WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_audit_log;
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM change_audit_log WHERE action = 'UPDATE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM security_audit_log GROUP BY action HAVING action_count > 1;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM system_audit_log WHERE user_id = 123456 AND action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS last_timestamp FROM user_audit_log;
SELECT * FROM user_logs;
SELECT user_id, action FROM system_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, action_taken FROM security_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, accessed_resource, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, change_type FROM change_logs WHERE change_type LIKE 'updated%';
SELECT * FROM user_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action FROM user_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_logs WHERE action = 'login' AND user_id = 123456;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_logs JOIN access_logs ON user_logs.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE user_logs.action = 'login' AND access_logs.accessed_resource = 'homepage';
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity FROM user_logs GROUP BY user_id;
